verses.verse: And it came to pass in the eleventh <WH259> <WH6240> year <WH8141>, in the third <WH7992> month, in the first <WH259> day of the month <WH2320>, that the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, speak <WH559> <WH8798> unto Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714>, and to his multitude <WH1995>; Whom art thou like <WH1819> <WH8804> in thy greatness <WH1433> ?

Behold, the Ashurn <WH804> was a cedar <WH730> in Lebanon <WH3844> with fair <WH3303> branches <WH6057>, and with a shadowing <WH6751> <WH8688> shroud <WH2793>, and of an high <WH1362> stature <WH6967>; and his top <WH6788> was among the thick boughs <WH5688>.

The waters <WH4325> made him great <WH1431> <WH8765>, the deep <WH8415> set him up on high <WH7311> <WH8790> with her rivers <WH5104> running <WH1980> <WH8802> round about <WH5439> his plants <WH4302>, and sent out <WH7971> <WH8765> her little rivers <WH8585> unto all the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704>.

Therefore his height <WH6967> was exalted <WH1361> <WH8804> above all the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704>, and his boughs <WH5634> were multiplied <WH7235> <WH8799>, and his branches <WH6288> became long <WH748> <WH8799> because of the multitude <WH7227> of waters <WH4325>, when he shot forth <WH7971> <WH8763>.

All the fowls <WH5775> of heaven <WH8064> made their nests <WH7077> <WH8765> in his boughs <WH5589>, and under his branches <WH6288> did all the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> bring forth their young <WH3205> <WH8804>, and under his shadow <WH6738> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> all great <WH7227> nations <WH1471>.
Thus was he fair <WH3302> <WH8799> in his greatness <WH1433>, in the length <WH753> of his branches <WH1808>: for his root <WH8328> was by great <WH7227> waters <WH4325>.

The cedars <WH730> in the garden <WH1588> of 'Elohim <WH430> could not hide <WH6004> <WH8804> him: the fir trees <WH1265> were not like <WH1819> <WH8804> his boughs <WH5589>, and the chesnut trees <WH6196> were not like his branches <WH6288>; nor any tree <WH6086> in the garden <WH1588> of 'Elohim <WH430> was like <WH1819> <WH8804> unto him in his beauty <WH3308>.

I have made <WH6213> <WH8804> him fair <WH3303> by the multitude <WH7230> of his branches <WH1808>: so that all the trees <WH6086> of Eden <WH5731>, that were in the garden <WH1588> of 'Elohim <WH430>, envied <WH7065> <WH8762> him.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; Because thou hast lifted up <WH1361> <WH8804> thyself in height <WH6967>, and he hath shot up <WH5414> <WH8799> his top <WH6788> among the thick boughs <WH5688>, and his heart <WH3824> is lifted up <WH7311> <WH8804> in his height <WH1363>;

I have therefore delivered <WH5414> <WH8799> him into the hand <WH3027> of the mighty one <WH410> of the heathen <WH1471>; he shall surely <WH6213> <WH8800> deal <WH6213> <WH8799> with him: I have driven him out <WH1644> <WH8765> for his wickedness <WH7562>.

And strangers <WH2114> <WH8801>, the terrible <WH6184> of the nations <WH1471>, have cut him off <WH3772> <WH8799>, and have left <WH5203> <WH8799> him: upon the mountains <WH2022> and in all the valleys <WH1516> his branches <WH1808> are fallen <WH5307> <WH8804>, and his boughs <WH6288> are broken <WH7665> <WH8735> by all the rivers <WH650> of the land <WH776>; and all the people <WH5971> of the earth <WH776> are gone down <WH3381> <WH8799> from his shadow <WH6738>, and have left <WH5203> <WH8799> him.
Upon his ruin <WH4658> shall all the fowls <WH5775> of the heaven <WH8064> remain <WH7931> <WH8799>, and all the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> shall be upon his branches <WH6288>:

To the end that none of all the trees <WH6086> by the waters <WH4325> exalt <WH1361> <WH8799> themselves for their height <WH6967>, neither shoot up <WH5414> <WH8799> their top <WH6788> among the thick boughs <WH5688>, neither their trees <WH352> stand up <WH5975> <WH8799> in their height <WH1363>, all that drink <WH8354> <WH8802> water <WH4325>: for they are all delivered <WH5414> <WH8738> unto death <WH4194>, to the nether parts <WH8482> of the earth <WH776>, in the midst <WH8432> of the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>, with them that go down <WH3381> <WH8802> to the pit <WH953>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; In the day <WH3117> when he went down <WH3381> <WH8800> to the grave <WH7585> I caused a mourning <WH56> <WH8689>: I covered <WH3680> <WH8765> the deep <WH8415> for him, and I restrained <WH4513> <WH8799> the floods <WH5104> thereof, and the great <WH7227> waters <WH4325> were stayed <WH3607> <WH8735>: and I caused Lebanon <WH3844> to mourn <WH6937> <WH8686> for him, and all the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704> fainted <WH5969> for him.

I made the nations <WH1471> to shake <WH7493> <WH8689> at the sound <WH6963> of his fall <WH4658>, when I cast him down <WH3381> <WH8687> to SH'ol <WH7585> with them that descend <WH3381> <WH8802> into the pit <WH953>: and all the trees <WH6086> of Eden <WH5731>, the choice <WH4005> and best <WH2896> of Lebanon <WH3844>, all that drink <WH8354> <WH8802> water <WH4325>, shall be comforted <WH5162> <WH8735> in the nether parts <WH8482> of the earth <WH776>.

They also went down <WH3381> <WH8804> into SH'ol <WH7585> with him unto them that be slain <WH2491> with the sword <WH2719>; and they that were his arm <WH2220>, that dwelt <WH3427> <WH8804> under his shadow <WH6738> in the midst <WH8432> of the heathen <WH1471>.

To whom art thou thus like <WH1819> <WH8804> in glory <WH3519> and in greatness <WH1433> among the trees <WH6086> of Eden <WH5731>? yet shalt thou be brought down <WH3381> <WH8717> with the trees <WH6086> of Eden <WH5731> unto the nether parts <WH8482> of the earth <WH776>: thou shalt lie <WH7901> <WH8799> in the midst <WH8432> of the uncircumcised <WH6189> with them that be slain <WH2491> by the sword <WH2719>. This is Pharaoh <WH6547> and all his multitude <WH1995>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
